issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Add support for Parquet data sources
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4466](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4466). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As a user, I would like to be able to run SQL queries against Parquet files.

For the initial implementation we can just support primitive types.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4466?focusedCommentId=16793959) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Issue resolved by pull request 3851
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3851>
